name: The Imported Tobacco Products Advisory Council
membership:
Associate member of ECMA (the European Cigar Manufacturers Association)
Associate member of ESTA (the European Smoking Tobacco Association)
goal:
ITPAC is the Trade Association for companies that import
and distribute tobacco products in the United Kingdom.

It focuses on the representation of smaller tobacco and the specialist trade, embracing all tobacco product categories.

The Imported Tobacco Products Advisory Council confirms that the financial information for the latest financial year is up to date and correct.
interests: Customs, Environment, Public Health, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Transposition and implementation of the revised Tobacco Products Directive in the UK market.
